attributes.action: stop closure of utc aerospace systems merseyside
attributes.additional_details:
To stop the closure of utc aerospace systems Huyton Merseyside. This closure would be detrimental to the aerospace industry especially in the northwest as 350 highly skilled aerospace engineers jobs could be lost, not including the possible lost of jobs with other local services that rely on work out sourced by our facility.
We need a viable manufacturing base in this country to preserve our status as aworld class innovators in aerospace design and technology
